data: Roger Sands had steel-gray eyes, a straight black line of brows drawn low and nearly meeting above them, thick black hair lightly powdered with silver at the temples, and a clean-shaven, aggressive chin.
Williamson, C. N. (Charles Norris), 1859-1920; Williamson, A. M. (Alice Muriel), 1869-1933
